languages.text: Whenever the Astra Militarum commander or their ally performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, all the commander's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are increased by +7 until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Every time the Astra Militarum commander or their ally uses a heroic act, the commander gains +7 to all of their characteristics until the end of combat.

languages.text: Когда командир Астра Милитарум или его союзник совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, все {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} командира увеличиваются на 7 до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Когда командир Астра Милитарум или его союзник совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, все {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} командира увеличиваются на 7 до конца боя.
Когда союзник командира Астра Милитарум совершает героический акт, командир получает +5 ко всем характеристикам до конца боя.

languages.text: Wenn der Astra Militarum-Commander oder ein Verbündeter eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} vollbringt, erhöhen sich alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} des Commanders bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +7.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Astra Militarum commander or their ally performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, all the commander's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are increased by +7 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Astra Militarum-Commander oder ein Verbündeter eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} vollbringt, erhöhen sich alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} des Commanders bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +7.

languages.text: Quand le commandant de l'Astra Militarum ou l'un de ses alliés effectuent un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g}, le commandant reçoit un bonus de +7 à toutes ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Astra Militarum commander or their ally performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, all the commander's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are increased by +7 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Quand le commandant de l'Astra Militarum ou l'un de ses alliés effectuent un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g}, le commandant reçoit un bonus de +7 à toutes ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 每当星界军指挥官或其盟友发动{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}时，星界军指挥官的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高7点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Astra Militarum commander or their ally performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, all the commander's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are increased by +7 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当星界军指挥官或其盟友发动{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}时，星界军指挥官的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高7点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Cada vez que el comandante del Astra Militarum o su aliado realicen un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g}, todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} del comandante aumentan en +7 hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Astra Militarum commander or their ally performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, all the commander's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are increased by +7 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el comandante del Astra Militarum o su aliado realicen un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g}, todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} del comandante aumentan en +7 hasta el final del combate.

Cada vez que un aliado del comandante del Astra Militarum usa un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g}, el comandante gana +5 a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta que termine el combate.

languages.text: 帝国防衛軍司令の味方が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用するたび、司令は戦闘終了まですべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+7される。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Astra Militarum commander or their ally performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, all the commander's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} are increased by +7 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 帝国防衛軍司令の味方が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用するたび、司令は戦闘終了まですべての能力が+5される。

languages.text: Astra Militarum komutanı veya dost birimi bir {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} yaptığında komutanın tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri{/g} +7 kazanır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
